name: Direct Line for American Businesses: Doing Business in Tunisia
description: Direct Line: Doing Business in Tunisia Bureau of Economic and Business Affairs November 10, 2016 Register to receive information on future Direct Line calls. Topic: Doing Business in Tunisia Host: Daniel Rubinstein, U.S. Ambassador, Embassy of the United States Tunis, Tunisia Date, time, time zone: Thursday, November 10, 2016, 9:30 a.m. EST (3:30 p.m. local) Brief Description of Call: U.S. Ambassador to Tunisia Daniel Rubinstein invites you to participate in a Direct Line Webinar highlighting export and investment opportunities for U.S. businesses in Tunisia following the Tunisian government’s recent approval of a number of important economic reforms. The webinar will also spotlight the Tunisia 2020 investment conference on November 29-30 to be hosted by President Beji Caid Essebsi, which will unveil important business and investment opportunities in a variety of sectors that have arisen as a result of these economic reforms. Join Ambassador Rubinstein and his Economic Team November 10th as they discuss “Doing Business in Tunisia." Please RSVP by Tuesday, November 8, 2016 by clicking here. The Office of Website Management, Bureau of Public Affairs, manages this site as a portal for information from the U.S. State Department. External links to other Internet sites should not be construed as an endorsement of the views or privacy policies contained therein.
